Microsoft Copilot

Microsoft Copilot is your AI companion designed to enhance everyday productivity and creativity. Leveraging the latest OpenAI and Microsoft AI models, Copilot provides users with a unique conversational experience that not only offers insights but also helps boost confidence and learning. Whether you need to generate images from text or simply seek guidance on various topics, Copilot is here to assist you.

  • AI-Powered Conversations: Engage with Copilot through voice or chat, fetching concise and insightful answers effortlessly. ü§ñ
  • Image Generation: Use built-in AI technology to create striking visuals from your text prompts, transforming ideas into reality. üé®
  • Versatile Writing Assistant: Produce, edit, and refine various types of content including emails, cover letters, and resumes swiftly. üìù
  • Multilingual Capabilities: Benefit from translation and proofreading across numerous languages, ensuring high-quality communication. üåç
  • Creative Support: Curate storylines, design logos, and develop illustrations for projects, enhancing your creative output. ‚ú®

üíµ Price:

Microsoft Copilot is available as a subscription service, requiring Copilot Pro for web versions of Microsoft Office applications. Users with Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscriptions gain enhanced capabilities in desktop apps.
